mainEntity.name: How does AI sourcing work without keyword matching?

acceptedAnswer.text: shortlistd.io uses semantic search to identify candidates across 800M+ profiles, matching based on experience and skill adjacency rather than rigid keyword filters.
Yes. shortlistd.io is designed to augment recruiters by autonomously sourcing candidates, conducting first-round interviews, and delivering decision-ready shortlists — without placement fees.

acceptedAnswer.text: shortlistd.io uses an AI voice interview agent that conducts structured, role-specific interviews, asks adaptive follow-up questions, and evaluates responses consistently across all candidates.
